replies.author: wsw11210
replies.txt_content:
I like pinao! Although i have learned for only three month in my childhood.
But i will listen it anytime when i do rest.
It make me feel relax and comfortable.
So.One of the reason i like the game is the BGM.
我喜欢钢琴！ 尽管在我的孩童时代我就学了三个月。
但是我会在我休息的时候回听一听。
它让我身心愉悦~、
所以，我挺喜欢这个游戏因为他的音乐很好听~
